dict.string: Please enable precise location. Turn-by-turn directions only work when precise location data is available.
TruckNav Pro needs your location to provide turn-by-turn truck navigation and display your position on the map.
TruckNav Pro needs your location to provide turn-by-turn truck navigation, even when the app is in the background.
TruckNav Pro needs continuous location access to provide turn-by-turn navigation in the background.
TruckNav Pro uses motion data to improve heading accuracy and camera following while driving.
